main event: Two bright lights were observed over North Andover, Massachusetts on March 17, 1963. The lights appeared to maneuver at high speed and then hover stationary before accelerating and disappearing.
interesting points: One of the lights had a red color that blinked on and off before changing to a steady white light and then blacking out.
The other light appeared as a steady white light that then blacked out.
No sound was heard from the objects.
The objects appeared to move in a straight course before blacking out.
The sighting lasted for approximately 32 seconds.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
